general.target_directory_desc: Set the directory you want to scan.
general.ignore_directories_desc: Enter the directories you want to exclude.

permissions.files_and_folders_desc: If you want to allow access to the Downloads, Desktop, Documents folders, and Cloud storage folders, please click the button below to change the settings.
permissions.full_disk_access_desc: If you want to allow access to all data on this Mac, please click the button below to change the settings.
